items.title: Guinea votes in referendum that could let coup leader run for President

items.title: Trump administration cancels U.S. hunger survey
items.summary: The USDA statement criticised the survey gathering process, saying the “questions used to collect the data are entirely subjective and do not present an accurate picture of actual food security.”

items.title: It is a settled issue, Nitish Kumar is NDA’s CM Face: JD(U) leader Sanjay K. Jha

items.title: Venezuelan President's YouTube account offline as tensions with U.S. escalate
items.summary: Mr. Maduro's YouTube account had more than 200,000 followers before it became unavailable on Friday and was used to publish the Venezuelan President's speeches, as well as clips from his weekly show on Venezuelan state TV

items.title: All-access pass: Chennai rides to the future
items.summary: ‘Chennai One’, a mobile application developed by the Chennai Unified Metropolitan Transport Authority, will allow commuters to use a single QR-code ticket for travelling on Chennai Metro Rail, MTC buses, and suburban trains. items.title: Modi’s visit to Manipur | A Prime Minister’s pit stop for promises

The Hindu finds that the PM met with select displaced people, while those he didn’t meet were

items.title: Is it feasible to blend isobutanol and diesel? | Explained
items.summary: When will the pilot project be completed? Why has ethanol been discarded as the possible alternative? What is the raw material? How is it produced? What are the pros and cons of using this biofuel? Will it have a bearing on ignition and better engine performance?

items.title: Why is India on the U.S. blacklist on fentanyl? | Explained

items.title: What is the significance of Saudi-Pakistan pact? | Explained

items.title: Amoebic meningoencephalitis | Conflated cases
